content: I'll allocate $700 per month towards the credit card debt and try to pay it off as aggressively as possible. I'll also look into balance transfer options with 0% introductory APRs to save on interest. Thanks for the advice! By the way, since I'm 32 and officially in my early thirties now, I'm wondering if I should start thinking about buying a house or investing in real estate. What are your thoughts on that?
